name: Lemon Crumble
description: A delicious dessert with a crunchy base and fresh lemon filling, perfect for citrus lovers. Ideal as a light and refreshing treat.
nutritional value: Approximately 320 kcal per serving. Contains simple carbohydrates, healthy fats from butter, and vitamin C from lemon.

name: Apple Crumble
description: A classic dessert made with caramelized apples and a crunchy oat and cinnamon topping. Excellent when served with vanilla ice cream.
nutritional value: Approximately 350 kcal per serving. Rich in fiber, antioxidants from apples, and slow-digesting carbohydrates.

name: Lemon Pie
description: A smooth and creamy lemon tart with a cookie crust, perfect for those who enjoy a sweet dessert with a tangy twist. Made with real lemon juice.
nutritional value: Around 400 kcal per serving. A good source of vitamin C and fats from butter and condensed milk.

name: Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Soft and wholesome cookies made with whole oats and chocolate chips. A perfect snack that's both energizing and delicious.
nutritional value: Approximately 250 kcal per cookie. Contains fiber, plant-based protein, and antioxidants from dark chocolate.
